ASK_INFO.TITLE: Ask for information
ASK_INFO.DESC: To set up this type of connection, please contact us:

TEXT.0: Choose the type of VPN connections you want to set up. Click
TEXT.2: to see examples of the different configurations.

VPN_MESH.TITLE: VPN Mesh configuration wizard
VPN_MESH.DESC: Create your own virtual private network in a few minutes and connect your computers securely over the Internet. All managed from FWCloud.net.

1.TITLE: Create new client
1.TEXT: Write a name for the connection

2.TITLE: Select remote
2.TEXT: You can set up to 5 remotes for the connection

3.TITLE: Enable services
3.TEXT: Services are defined to allow traffic between VPN clients to specific ports and protocols.

4.TITLE: Create new VPN connection
4.TEXT1: A new OpenVPN client configuration will be created with the following data:
4.TEXT2: This action will automatically perform the following operations. Click 'Apply' to proceed or go back to correct.

ERRORS.EXISTING_CN: There's already a CN with the same name
ERRORS.GET_CN: An error occurred while checking the validity of the connection name
ERRORS.GET_OVPN_SERVER: An error occurred while reading the data of the OpenVPN server '{{ name }}'
ERRORS.GET_CA_NODE: Could not find information for the selected CA in the object tree
ERRORS.GET_CONFIG_OPTIONS: Unable to get OpenVPN configuration options
ERRORS.GET_CONFIG_SERVER_OPTION: Couldn't find OpenVPN configuration server option

NO_REMOTES.1: Es obligatorio definir al menos un objeto remote

GET_FIREWALLS.1: An error occurred while retrieving the firewalls from the database

GET_OVPN.1: An error occurred while retrieving the OpenVPN servers from the database

ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.0: Do not allow services from other VPN clients
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.1: Allow all services from other clients
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.2: Enable the following services from other VPN clients

SUCCESS.1: OpenVPN configuration successfully created. If you wish, you can download the configuration file using the buttons below.

ERROR.1: The wizard could not be completed due to an error

INFO.START: Obteniendo informaci√≥n del servidor OpenVPN {{ openvpn }}
INFO.ERROR_SERVER_OPT: Incorrect 'server' option on the OpenVPN server
INFO.ERROR_SERVER_MASK: Incorrect mask value in 'server' option of OpenVPN server

CLI_CONFIG.ERROR_INSTALL: Could not install the configuration on {{ name }}, no installation interface/IP defined
CLI_CONFIG.WARN_INSTALL_CL: The configuration could not be installed in all the nodes of the cluster {{ name }}. You can do it manually from the VPN section of the application
CLI_CONFIG.WARN_INSTALL_FW: The configuration could not be installed on the firewall {{ name }}. You can do it manually from the VPN section of the application
CLI_CONFIG.WARN_INSTALL_CANCEL_CL: The installation of the configuration on the node {{ fwName }} of the cluster {{ clName }} has been cancelled.
CLI_CONFIG.WARN_INSTALL_CANCEL_FW: The configuration installation on the firewall {{ name }} has been cancelled.
CLI_CONFIG.INFO_INSTALL: You can do this manually from the VPN section of the application.

ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.START: Creating allowed traffic rule on {{ type }} '{{ name }}'
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.ERROR_NO_OPS: The OpenVPN server has no configuration options
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.ERROR_DEV_OP: No 'dev' option found on OpenVPN server
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.ERROR_NO_IF: Missing interfaces node in selected firewall
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.ERROR_NO_DEV: Couldn't find 'dev' option node in the firewalls tree
ALLOWED_TRAFFIC.ERROR_NO_SER: Could not find the 'server' option on the OpenVPN server

POLICY.ERROR_INSTALL: Could not install the policy on {{ name }}, no installation interface/IP defined
POLICY.WARN_INSTALL_CL: The policy could not be installed in all the nodes of the cluster {{ name }}
POLICY.WARN_INSTALL_FW: The policy could not be installed on the firewall {{ name }}
POLICY.WARN_INSTALL_CANCEL_CL: The installation of the policy on the node {{ fwName }} of the cluster {{ clName }} has been cancelled.
POLICY.WARN_INSTALL_CANCEL_FW: The policy installation on the firewall {{ name }} has been cancelled.
POLICY.INFO_INSTALL: You can do this manually using the 'Install' option.

VPN_CONNECT.TITLE: VPN Connect configuration wizard
VPN_CONNECT.DESC: Connect all the equipment in your office or private use to your virtual private network by installing a tunnel terminator. Managed from FWCloud.net.

VPN_DIRECT.TITLE: VPN Direct configuration wizard
VPN_DIRECT.DESC: Set up your own VPN server to access computers on your network in a secure and managed way from FWCloud.net.
